JobFullDesc: You know us as the food and beverage company behind a lot of your favorites like Stouffer’s, Nesquik, Toll House, and Lean Cuisine as well as new discoveries like Sweet Earth and Chameleon Cold-Brew coffee. Across our organization, we’re building a workplace where teamwork is essential, courage is rewarded, speed is encouraged, and agility is the norm to delight our consumers every single day!The LEAD Team is Nestlé USA’s full-service, in-house creative agency that engages with consumers across all digital touch points. From creating best-in-class digital content to connecting with consumers on social, The LEAD Team leads Nestlé USA into the digital age.Job Responsibilities: Creates, manages, and produces digital design solutions for a variety of mediums including, but not limited to, social media assets, banners, print and campaign work. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver designs that are creative, breakthrough, and align with technical and brand standards. Take ideas from concept to execution, working with project managers, design colleagues, and content experts to deliver effective solutions to design problems. Use the latest software and applications to design and develop digital solutions. Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to brands and leadership. Enforce all brand equity guidelines and best practices. Design and develop banners, rich emails, social media assets and other electronic media. Collaborate closely with Project Managers, Associate Creative Directors and Copywriters to execute creative concepts. Utilize and understand social media best practices, aspect ratios, and safe zones.Qualifications/Skills: Strong experience and knowledge of skills in both digital and print, with expert understanding of digital design and experience building files for both print and digital. Demonstrated strong understanding of color theory and color relationships. Experienced at translating a creative brief into clear and motivating creative. Demonstrated ability to think creatively and provide marketable solutions. Understand the fine points of brand guidelines and adhere to their standards and rules, with a great eye for typography. Listens and communicates well and is open to feedback. Strong communication, presentation, and strategy skills. Proactive, organized and detail-oriented work style. Able to effectively handle multiple assignments concurrently in a fast-paced environment, partner effectively and consistently meet deadlines. Design software expertise (primarily Adobe Suite). HTML5 banner animation skills/experience is a bonus, but not required. Illustration experience is a bonus, but not required.Education and Experience Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in communication design, graphic design, visual arts, or equivalent experience 3 to 5 years of experience in graphic design in agency or corporate environment CPG experience is a plus The Nestlé Companies are an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer seeking diversity in qualified applicants for employment. All applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.
